meanings.sent1: She always politicalizes every conversation, turning it into a debate about government.
meanings.sent2: The candidate politicalizes every issue, even the smallest matters.
meanings.sent3: He politicalizes everything, even choosing what to have for lunch!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for politics politicalizes her entire life, making every decision a political statement.
meanings.sent5: The way she politicalizes every topic is both impressive and exhausting.

meanings.definition: To bring a political aspect to something.
meanings.sent1: The news channel politicalizes every story, adding a political angle to even the weather report.
meanings.sent2: He always politicalizes family gatherings, bringing up political discussions at every opportunity.
meanings.sent3: She politicalizes movie nights by only choosing films with political themes.
meanings.sent4: His presence politicalizes any event, making it a platform for political discussions.
meanings.sent5: The way he politicalizes every situation shows his deep interest in politics.
